document.full_text: choi geesung was named chief executive, and jay y. lee, son of the former group chairman lee kun-hee, was named to the new post of chief operating officer.
document.title: management shakeup at samsung electronics
lines_and_colors: choi geesung was named chief executive, and jay y. lee, son of the former group chairman lee kun-hee, was named to the new post of chief operating officer.
